'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional

'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Non-functional
'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.': Functional
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Non-functional
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional
'All CCR users shall receive training before the WCS system is deployed. One training session will be held for 100% of CCR users before system deployment (based on a CCR user being available)': Non-functional
'Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.': Non-functional
'The system shall be displayable on any work computer a CCR user may have. The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.': Functional
'Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.': Non-functional
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Non-functional
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional
'The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.': Functional
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional

'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Non-functional
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Non-functional
'The system shall update or create new property listings in the MLS': Functional
'The product shall able to handle a large number of games simultaneously.': Non-functional
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Non-functional
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Non-functional
'Every registered user will have access to the product’s support site via the Internet. 70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.': Non-functional
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional
'The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.': Non-functional
'The system shall search for available recycled parts for the supplied vehicle parts and suppliers.': Functional
'When a game is ended the product shall notify the players that the game is ended.': Functional
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Non-functional
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional
'The product will update existing room equipment.': Functional
'100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.': Non-functional
'The leads washing functionality will verify the users authentication and rights to make parameter updates.': Functional

'The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers': Functional

'The product shall synchronize with the office system every hour.': Non-functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member to move a student from one clinical lab section to another clinical lab section corresponding to the same clinical class.': Functional
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional
'The vehicle data shall include vehicle year make and model': Functional
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional
'Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.': Non-functional
'The list of dispute cases that are displayed after a search is performed must be color coded for easy identification of dispute cases based upon the dispute case status.': Non-functional
'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.': Functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'The system shall interface with CampusConnect’s central server': Non-functional
'The system must use a point and click interface. 100% of all selection and navigation functionality must be able to be activated/selected by either a mouse or a keyboard': Non-functional
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Non-functional
'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.': Functional
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Non-functional
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional
'All CCR users shall receive training before the WCS system is deployed. One training session will be held for 100% of CCR users before system deployment (based on a CCR user being available)': Non-functional
'Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.': Non-functional

'Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.': Functional
'Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.': Non-functional
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Non-functional
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional
'The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.': Functional
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'If projected the data must be readable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to read Event / Activity data from a viewing distance of 30'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Non-functional

'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional

'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional

'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional

'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional

'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Non-functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional

'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a report of needed classes for a given quarter for all cohorts of all programs for Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members’ planning purposes.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional

'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional
'The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.': Functional
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional

'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.'

'Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.': Non-functional

'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'The system shall interface with CampusConnect’s central server': Non-functional
'The system must use a point and click interface. 100% of all selection and navigation functionality must be able to be activated/selected by either a mouse or a keyboard': Non-functional
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Non-functional
'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.': Functional
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Non-functional

'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional

'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional

'Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.': Functional
'Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.': Non-functional
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Non-functional
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional

'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional

'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional

'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional

'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional

'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional

'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional

'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall display Events or Activities.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional

'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional

'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional

'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies. Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional

'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional

'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional
'The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.': Functional
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to remove himself or herself from the list of players.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional

'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional

'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When the offensive player takes a shot the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.'

'The vehicle data shall include vehicle year make and model': Functional
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional
'Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.': Non-functional
'The list of dispute cases that are displayed after a search is performed must be color coded for easy identification of dispute cases based upon the dispute case status.': Non-functional
'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.': Functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'The system shall interface with CampusConnect’s central server': Non-functional
'The system must use a point and click interface. 100% of all selection and navigation functionality must be able to be activated/selected by either a mouse or a keyboard': Non-functional
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Non-functional
'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.': Functional
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Non-functional
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional
'All CCR users shall receive training before the WCS system is deployed. One training session will be held for 100% of CCR users before system deployment (based on a CCR user being available)': Non-functional
'Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.': Non-functional
'The system shall be displayable on any work computer a CCR user may have. The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.': Functional
'Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.': Non-functional
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Non-functional
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional

'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The notification of the game ending will include the reason the game is ended (i.e. a player has won the game or a player has ended the game).'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Non-functional
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Non-functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Non-functional

'The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services.System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Non-functional
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Non-functional
'The system shall update or create new property listings in the MLS': Functional
'The product shall able to handle a large number of games simultaneously.': Non-functional
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Non-functional
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Non-functional
'Every registered user will have access to the product’s support site via the Internet. 70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.': Non-functional
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional
'The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.': Non-functional
'The system shall search for available recycled parts for the supplied vehicle parts and suppliers.': Functional
'When a game is ended the product shall notify the players that the game is ended.': Functional
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Non-functional
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional
'The product will update existing room equipment.': Functional

'The vehicle data shall include vehicle year make and model': Functional

'The list of dispute cases that are displayed after a search is performed must be color coded for easy identification of dispute cases based upon the dispute case status.': Non-functional

'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.': Functional
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.': Non-functional

'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Non-functional

'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional

'Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.': Non-functional
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.': Non-functional
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Non-functional
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional

'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional

'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall retain the customer’s buying preferences and information.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional

'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Non-functional

'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Non-functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Non-functional
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Non-functional
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Non-functional

'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional

'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Portals.The product shall help System Administrators to analyze the transactions with ad-hoc reporting and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional

'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Non-functional
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Non-functional
'Each time a conference room is reserved the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.': Functional
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Non-functional
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional
'The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.': Functional
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Non-functional
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Non-functional
'The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.': Functional
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Non-functional
'Each page shall contain a navigation menu which shows the index into which the current page is contained.': Non-functional
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users. 80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product’s software code.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Non-functional
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Non-functional
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Non-functional
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Non-functional
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Non-functional
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Non-functional
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Non-functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Non-functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional

'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Non-functional

'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Non-functional
